questions.title: What makes a bigger difference?
questions.subtitle: for reducing CO2 in average European or North American diet

answerExplanation.text: Beef has by far the highest footprint of any meat. Without eating any less meat, this step alone would reduce the carbon footprint of the average Western diet by one-fifth!
